short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select any text to see its IPA transcription and to hear its pronunciation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pronunciations are retrieved from Google servers via the speechSynthesis API.

The IPA transcriptions are based on the CMUdic by Carnegie Mellon University.
